1.15.2.4.1.2: Blazes will no longer use flame touch effect on push attacker away unless Flame Touch is set to true in config; entities should no longer crash server when trying to find and ride a spider mount; removed cave spider from default riders for spider rider; zombies can break blocks now
1.15.2.4.1.1: Fixed crash/bug with zombiepigman feature when player breaks blocks (see issue #32); Zombie Pigman features and AI should all work now
